wikipedia_page.main: Imogen Bain (17 April 1959 – 5 July 2014) was an English stage and screen actress.

response: Denis Lill appears as the Simulant Captain and Death. The other 'Apocalypse Boys' were played by Dinny Powell, Robert Inch and Jeremy Peters playing Famine, War and Pestilence respectively. Jennifer Calvert plays the 'Artificial Reality' character in Lister's detective scenario. Steve Devereaux plays Jimmy. Liz Hickling appears as Simulant Lieutenant, Imogen Bain plays Lola and Stephen Marcus plays Bear Strangler McGee.
**Imogen Bain, 54, actress (The Phantom of the Opera, Casualty).
*Imogen Bain, 55, English actress (The Phantom of the Opera, Casualty), pneumonia.Obituary: Imogen Bain
